scripts.build: node-sass sass/index.scss css/style.css && cleancss -o css/style.min.css css/style.css
scripts.build:critical:header: node-sass sass/header.scss css/critical/header.css --output-style expanded && cleancss -o css/critical/header.min.css css/critical/header.css
scripts.build:critical:footer: node-sass sass/footer.scss css/critical/footer.css --output-style expanded && cleancss -o css/critical/footer.min.css css/critical/footer.css
scripts.build:critical: npm run build:critical:header && npm run build:critical:footer
